Price : Rs. 2 .00 [3156(2005)/Ex. Gaz.]
n4 THE GAZE-ITE OF PAKISTAN. EXTRA., AUCUST 26. 2fi)5 [PARI I
ANo wuErees the National Assembly is not in session and the President is
satisfied that circumstances exist which render it necessary to take immediate action;
Now, rHsnspone, in exercise of the powers conferred by clause (l) of
Article 89 of the Constitution of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan, the President is
pleased to make and promulgate the following Ordinance:-
l. Short title and commencement.---( I ) This Ordinance may be called
the Public Investments (Financial Safeguards) (Amendment) Ordinance, 2005.
(2) It shall come into forcâ‚¬ at once
2. Amendment of section 4, Ordinance XLVI of 196t0.-In the Public
lnvestments (Financial Safeguards) Ordinance, 1960 (XLVI of 1960), hereinafter
referred to as the said Ordinance, in section 4,-
(a) lbr the words, comma and figure "Companies Act, 1913" the
words. comma and figure "Companies Ordinance. 1984" shall
be substituted; and
(b) in the margin, for the figures and word "VII of 1913" the figures
and word "XLV[ of 1984" shall be substituted.
3. Insertion of new section 9A, Ordinance, XLVI of 1960.-In the
said Ordinance, after section 9 the following new section shall be insened, namely:-
"9A. Ordinance not to apply lo PICL. -Notw ithstanding anything
contained in this Ordinance the Pakistan Telecommunication Company
Limited upon its privatization pursuant to the Privatization Commission
Ordinance, 2000 (LII of2000) shall not be deemed to be a corporation,
institution or undertaking established with the aid of public revenues
of the Federation or the Federal Government for the purpose of this
Ordinance.".
UENERAL
PERVEZ MUSHARRAF,
President.
